en-US.title: Health Care for the Homeless
en-US.description: An inclusive health care provider that offers various services such as substance use services, HIV Testing and Counseling, Support Groups and resources for immigrants, LGBTQ+ individuals, and youth. This organization is dedicated to ending homelessness in Baltimore and beyond, helping individuals move towards health and stability. Advocacy for justice forms a significant part of their mission.

address: The Harry and Jeanette Weinberg Building, 421 Fallsway, Baltimore, MD 21202, USA
